public abstract class BaseSAML2ProfileRequestContext<RequestType extends org.opensaml.saml2.core.RequestAbstractType,ResponseType extends org.opensaml.saml2.core.StatusResponseType,ProfileConfigurationType extends edu.internet2.middleware.shibboleth.common.relyingparty.provider.saml2.AbstractSAML2ProfileConfiguration>
extends edu.internet2.middleware.shibboleth.common.profile.provider.BaseSAMLProfileRequestContext<RequestType,ResponseType,org.opensaml.saml2.core.NameID,ProfileConfigurationType>

Contextual object used to accumlate information as profile requests are being processed.
